Text: Please People,Remember Seed so other people could download this new version of screenflow 3.0.5 app Peace!!.
What gives? Nothing is happening. Gee, it's only 14MB, you'd think people could seed.

Something smells fishy here. 

If it's REALLY from the Mac App Store, then it doesn't need a serial number. None of the MAS apps do.

And as I said before: think twice before you download a torrent from an anonymous uploader.
PS: I love the 7th point in the description: why can't we "comment dum thing's or negative thing's"? Afraid of something, anonymous uploader? :)
